amendment.description: Amendment requires NASA to certify in advance of any agreement with the People's Republic of China that the exchange of technology will not improve Chinese missile or space launch capabilities; and requires an annual audit of the policies with respect to the export of technologies and the transfer of scientific and technical information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require NASA to certify in advance of any agreement with the People's Republic of China that the exchange of technology will not improve the Chinese missile or space launch capabilities and requires an annual audit of the policies with respect to the export of technologies and the transfer of scientific and technical information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sweeney amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
